resources.string: Let\'s stay in touch, click here to adjust your communication preferences

We know true fans love being in the know, so Skiddle would like to send you information about relevant events, according to our Privacy Policy. You can opt out below, from your user profile or any emails we send out.

By completing your order you accept the Terms & Conditions of using Skiddle as well as the terms and conditions set by the promoter. Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed.

There’s a terrifying fact that 1 in 2 people will get Cancer. That’s 50%. Or half. People you know, people you love or people you care about. You’ve more chance of getting cancer than winning on a national lottery scratch card. Simply terrifying.
